definition: to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

sentences.english: And provide the theory instruction for designing other types anemometer .
sentences.chinese: 爲今後設計其它類型的風速計提供理論指導。

sentences.english: Wind speed measurements shall be made with a cup classified anemometer.
sentences.chinese: 用已分好類別的杯狀風速計進行風速測量。

sentences.english: We've got a wind anemometer up there.
sentences.chinese: 我們在那裝了一個風速計。

sentences.english: Surface winds are normally measured by instruments called anemometers.
sentences.chinese: 地面風通常用稱爲風速計的儀器來測量。

sentences.english: Incline the wind meter to find the maximum wind speed direction.
sentences.chinese: 運用風速計去發現最大風速及頛向。
